title: Healthy Eating Guide
content: As we age, it's important to pay attention to the nutrients we consume. Aim for a diet rich in protein, fiber, and vitamins, while avoiding high-sugar, high-salt, and high-fat foods.
author: Health Experts Team

title: Exercises to Prevent Falls
content: Seniors can reduce the risk of falling through simple balance exercises such as single-leg standing, tai chi, and leg-strengthening routines.
author: Physiotherapy Team

title: Mental Health and Social Engagement
content: Loneliness and depression can significantly impact the well-being of older adults. Participating in community events, staying connected with family and friends, and joining interest groups are great ways to support mental health.
author: Counseling Team
